name: Heating Way
description:
You're an alien vibing in the space, until the sun randomly explodes!

Escape from the exploding sun and survive as much as you can, while the gravity pulls you towards the planets! Avoid the meteors and pass quicky the exploding planets!

Controls: WASD /  ArrowsMoveSpacebarJumpMouseClick the Menu Options Credits:
  • Game by Oscar Moreno (Asdonaur)
  • Music: "Maniac"  from Adventure Music Collection by Ansimuz
